scripts.db-create: docker exec -it -e PGPASSWORD=root achievements-pg psql -U root -c "CREATE DATABASE achievements"
scripts.db-drop: docker exec -it -e PGPASSWORD=root achievements-pg psql -U root -c "DROP DATABASE achievements"
scripts.db-recreate: npm run db-drop && npm run db-create
scripts.db-reset: npm run db-recreate && npm run migration-apply && npm run seed-run
scripts.db-reset-force: docker-compose down --remove-orphans && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 10 && npm run db-reset && docker-compose up -d
scripts.first-run: npm run env && npm run docker-rebuild && npm run support && sleep 10 && npm run db-create && npm run migration-apply && npm run seed-run && npm run start
scripts.install-deps: sudo npm install -g jest knex lerna rimraf ts-node typescript && yarn install
scripts.restart: docker stop $(docker ps -aq --filter 'label=com.etimo-achievements.monitored') && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.start-fresh: yarn install && npm run build && npm run openapi && npm run docker-rebuild && npm run start
scripts.test: for p in packages/*; do (cd $p && npm run test) || exit 1; done
scripts.test-integration: for p in packages/*; do (cd $p && npm run test-integration) || exit 1; done
